features: TempLock™ Double Wall Vacuum Insulation keeps drinks up to 72 hours iced, 24 hours cold, 16 hours hot. Does not sweat
EarthGrip™ Powder Coat finish is tactile, easy to grip and extremely durable
18/8 Kitchen-Grade Electropolished Stainless Steel doesn't transfer flavor, no metal aftertaste
Woodie™ cap meticulously hand finished with natural plant oils and waxes to provide hard-wearing and durable protection
Bottle is dishwasher safe, cap should be hand washed
